body.name: Chemical Guys AIR_221_04 Chuy Bubble Gum Premium Air Freshener and Oder Eliminator, Bubble Gum Scent (Great for Cars, Trucks, SUVs, RVs & More) 4 fl oz

features: CHUY BUBBLE GUM SCENT - Chuy Bubble Gum Air Freshener offers a fun and nostalgic fragrance of classic bubble gum, infusing your car with a playful and sweet scent.
FUN TIME FRESHNESS - Formulated with advanced technology, this air freshener ensures a playful scent that keeps your car smelling delightful sweet and mouth-watering, apply a fresh burst as needed!
ELIMINATES FOUL ODORS - Say goodbye to unwanted smells with the powerful odor eliminators in Chuy Bubble Gum Scent, leaving your car with a fresh and captivating scent.
VERSATILE APPLICATION - Not limited to cars, enjoy the Chuy Bubble Gum Scent's playful goodness in your home, office, or any space that could use a touch of fun and sweetness.
EASY APPLICATION - With a simple spray, fill your surroundings with the delightful scent of bubble gum, turning every ride into a joyful and nostalgic experience.

THE GO TO BRAND IN CAR CARE - Car lovers choose Chemical Guys, not only for the finest car care products, but the world class customer support and vast detailing knowledge Chemical Guys is more than a brand it's a lifestyle with a worldwide following
body.description: Chuy Bubble Gum Scent - the air freshener that takes you back to carefree days with the delightful fragrance of classic bubble gum! Fill your car with a playful and sweet scent that brings a smile to your face. Formulated with advanced technology, this air freshener ensures a long-lasting scent, keeping your car smelling delightful for an extended period. Say goodbye to unwanted smells as the powerful odor eliminators leave your car with a fresh and captivating scent. Not just for cars, enjoy the Chuy Bubble Gum Scent's playful goodness in your home, office, or any space that could use a touch of fun and sweetness. With easy application, a simple spray fills your surroundings with the delightful scent of bubble gum, turning every ride into a joyful and nostalgic experience. Elevate your car's ambiance and relive those carefree memories with Chemical Guys Chuy Bubble Gum Scent - the perfect air freshener for a fun-filled journey!How To Use:1. Clean and vacuum any debris that may be imparting foul smells into the automobile interior.2. Shake well.3. Lightly mist your preferred air freshener around carpets, cloth upholstery and under seats.4. For AC flushing service, set AC to max cold and recirculate, and mist a few sprays of the preferred scent underneath the recirculation intake under the dashboard on the passenger side.5. Enjoy fresh scent.6. Repeat as necessary.We make looking good so easy. Visit the Chemical Guys Store on Amazon to see our entire Arsenal; find Pro Tips, Special Promotions, and New Product Launches; Link at the top of the page, Click Follow!Works safely on all automotive vehicle brands including: Acura, Audi, BMW, Buick, Cadillac, Chevrolet (Chevy), Chrysler, Dodge, Fisker, Ford, GMC, Honda, Hummer, Hyundai, Infiniti, Isuzu, Jaguar, Jeep, Kia, Land Rover, Lexus, Lincoln, Mazda, Mercedes, Mercury, Mini, Mitsubishi, Nissan, Pontiac, Porsche, RAM, Saab, Subaru, Tesla, Toyota, Volkswagen, and Volvo; and RV brands like Coachmen, Entegra, Forest River, Newmar, Thor Motor Coach, Winnebago, AirStream, K-Z, Keystone and Midwest Automotive Designs

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: About us Chemical Guys are more than a brand, it's a lifestyle with a worldwide following. Driven by adventure, a passion for shine, and a love for the road ahead, we welcome any and all who share this passion to become part of our family. When we started, we decided to wipe the slate clean and start off fresh with the simple idea to make the best quality chemicals manufactured right here in California to high quality standard. Over the years, we have grown into so much more: a huge library of detailing knowledge, a benchmark in the industry, group of friends with one common passion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Bought it for my office and it smells amazing!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells like bubble guns
reviews.reviewText: Smells so good smells exactly like bubble gum

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Smells great but doesn't last long
reviews.reviewText: I use this inside my car. It smells amazing, but I think the smell fades quickly. I want to get punched in the face by bubble gum when I open my car door... This doesn't do that for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I was expecting more of a sweet bubble gum smell but the cinnamon smell is the most prominent which gives it a Big Red Gum smell.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bubble Yum, Hubba Bubba, Bubblicious...
reviews.reviewText: It smells just like bubble gum... just what I wanted .. I listed all the bubble gums of my childhood I'm trying to reproduce the aroma of... This comes as close as you can get, without chewing it!I wanted a household cleaner which smelled like bubble gum, much like the old Jobmaster by Costco.. Do you remember that aroma of bubble gum??, I used to love cleaning house...I can't find any general purpose household cleanser {although I did find a 420 glass cleaner which can also be used for windows and countertops ... next month I purchase this} but I did find this air freshener by Chemical Guys. I'm going to subscribe for scheduled sending, it's that good I sprayed in the bathroom, came back an hour later,and it still smelled like bubble gum..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Does NOT last more than 5 minutes.
reviews.reviewText: Don't waste your money, this is junk. Seriously, it doesn't last more than 5 minutes. Very disappointed for real.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Good strong scent; doesn't last
reviews.reviewText: It has a great strong scent, main problem is it doesn't last, I've applied it on three different vehicles and the scent just doesn't go past the third day!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells like childhood
reviews.reviewText: Doesn't last too long, but smells just like the gum! I use this most often. It's fun for the summer also.
Love this scent, but like others have said, it does not last long!

reviews.reviewTitle: Great smell. But as most sweet cent
reviews.reviewText: Great smell. But as most sweet cent. It's doesn't last long.
Smells like double bubble or hubba bubba gum! A little bit goes a long way so it should last quite a while. Everyone loved it, I would definitely buy this again. 😊
